thread.title: Afternoon Tea at The Goring
thread.title_full: Afternoon Tea at The Goring - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Hilary C
title: Afternoon Tea at The Goring
text:
We had a delightful afternoon tea, the food, the staff and the service were all excellent. The sandwiches were moist and flavourful, the cakes were a piece of art and melted in the mouth and the scones fresh and light.. When it was time to leave the cakes we had not managed to eat were boxed so we could take them home to eat later
Every one was polite, helpful and charming, this is definitely the place in London to visit for a relaxing afternoon tea
